text:
verkstedt | Senior JS Developer | Berlin, Germany | Full-time or Freelancer | ONSITE | https://verkstedt.com/

We are looking for a senior JS developer to joins our newly founded team.

Deep experience with React & Node would be greatly appreciated.

We are offering:

- Competitive salary - Flexible work hours - Gear of choice - Coffee, fruits & snacks - Working on a greenfield project

Get in touch: jobs@verkstedt.com
